title: yncrahmet
author: yncrahmet
content: Hello, Project Owners!I am Ahmet Yeni√ßeri, a part of a team that specializes in establishing, managing, and expanding infrastructure for Turkish-speaking crypto communities. Our team consists of experienced moderators who have previously worked on projects such as Near Protocol Turkey and Aurora Turkey.Furthermore, I have a business partner with various achievements in different projects, including Caduceus Network, Fuse Network, Fusotao Protocol, Ave AI, Moovy, and more. Currently, we are managing the Turkish communities for the Metapool and Acet Protocol projects.We are actively promoting the project within our community and on our social media accounts in Turkish. We collaborate with other Turkish communities and promote your project there as well. We share every announcement and development with our community and Turkish groups. Additionally, we create detailed explanatory videos for important events like airdrops.If the team allocates a budget, we organize special events and airdrops for the Turkish community. When desired, we arrange additional events and advertisements with Turkish projects and leading Turkish communities.We are actively responding to member questions between 07:00 - 22:00 UTC every day.We, as Crypto Enthusiasts, look forward to collaborating with you and promoting your project within the Turkish community!üåç Our Websitehttps://kriptocilginlari.com‚úÖ Our Social Media Accountshttps://kriptocilginlari.com/ouraccounts‚û°Ô∏è Contactüì© Email: ahmet@kriptocilginlari.com‚úÖ Telegram: @yncrahmet‚úÖ Twitter: @yncrahmet00
